goal.ch: To acquire background knowledge on Riemannian geometry.
goal.en: To acquire background knowledge on Riemannian geometry.

outline.ch: Review of tensors, manifolds, and vector bundles. Riemannian metrics, affine connections, Riemannian connections, geodesics, exponential maps, convex neighborhoods, curvature, Jacobi fields, isometric immersion, Gauss-Bonnet Theorem.
outline.en: Review of tensors, manifolds, and vector bundles. Riemannian metrics, affine connections, Riemannian connections, geodesics, exponential maps, convex neighborhoods, curvature, Jacobi fields, isometric immersion, Gauss-Bonnet Theorem.
